get.description: Get a list of all litigation cases. You can use query parameters to filter the results by including by forum, the officers involved, or the date range. This endpoint supports pagination to limit the number of results returned.

parameters.name: defendants
parameters.description: Filter by defendants. Include a comma seperated list of the IDs of the officers whos cases you want returned.

case_title.description: The case title or caption for this litigation. Should contain the names of the parties involved.

docket_number.description: The docket number for this litigation. This is the unique identifier for the case in the court system.

court_level.description: The level of the court where this litigation is being heard. This could be a state court, federal court, or other court system.

jurisdiction.description: The geographical or subject matter jurisdiction (e.g.,  Eastern District, Northern District, County name for  state courts) of the court where litigation is being heard.

state.description: The state where this litigation is being heard. This should be the two-letter abbreviation for the state.

description.description: A description of the litigation. This could include a summary of the case, the legal issues involved, or other relevant information.

start_date.description: The date when this litigation was filed or initiated.

dispositions.description: A list of any dispositions in this litigation. This could include a settlement, judgment, or other outcome.

desceripton.description: A description of the disposition. This could include the terms of a settlement, the amount of a judgment, or other relevant information.

date.description: The date when this disposition was reached.

settlement_amount.description: The amount of any settlement or judgment in this litigation. This should be in USD.

url.description: A URL to more information about this litigation. This could be a link to a court website such as [Court Listener](https://www.courtlistener.com/), [PACER](https://www.pacer.gov/), or other legal research resources.

documents.description: A link to retrieve the documents associated with this litigation

defendants.description: A list of any officers who are named as defendants in the litigation.

enum: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

date_of_birth.description: The date of birth of the officer

state_ids.description: The state ids of the officer

uid.description: The UUID of this state id

state.description: The state of the state id

id_name.description: The name of the id. For example, Tax ID, Driver's License, etc.

employment_history.description: A link to retrieve the employment history of the officer

allegations.description: A link to retrieve the allegations against the officer

litigation.description: A link to retrieve the litigation against the officer

post.description: Create a new litigation case. This endpoint requires a case title and docket number to be provided. User must be a contributor to create a litigation record.

delete.description: Delete a single litigation case by ID. The user must be a contributor from the same organization that initially submitted a litigation record to delete it.
